about_the_game:
Step into the enchanting world of AURUM, where an epic tale unfolds. Unleash the power of your imagination as you embark on a thrilling journey. Discover a realm shattered by nefarious thieves from the depths of hell, who cunningly pilfered the priceless treasures belonging to the revered wolf gods. Now, chaos reigns supreme, and it's up to you, a courageous traveler, to assist the gods in their quest to reclaim and safeguard these extraordinary relics. Prepare to be captivated by an adventure like no other, where destiny awaits and the fate of AURUM hangs in the balance. Join us on this spellbinding expedition and let your heroic spirit soar!


Unleash the power within and join the mighty pack of wolves on a thrilling quest to recover the lost treasures of legend. Embrace the ancient bond between man and nature as you embark on an extraordinary journey alongside the divine wolf gods themselves. These majestic guardians watch over the very fabric of our world, ensuring harmony and equilibrium for all. But now, tragedy has struck as their cherished treasures have been mercilessly snatched away. It falls upon your shoulders, brave adventurer, to aid the wolf gods in their noble mission of reclamation. Together, we shall restore balance and restore the legacy of these fabled artifacts. Step into a world where destiny intertwines with the strength of the pack. Answer the call, and let the adventure begin!


Travel the beautiful world of AURUM and discover exciting places.



Embark on an exhilarating journey with AURUM, the ultimate collecting and hidden object game. Explore captivating maps in search of precious ores that lie hidden, waiting to be discovered. Channel your inner explorer as you wield the power of the left mouse button to mine these valuable resources. Immerse yourself in the thrill of the hunt, strategically uncovering each treasure trove. Can you conquer the challenge and unearth all the hidden gems? Your keen eye and skilled hand will guide you towards triumph. Unleash your full potential and conquer each level, for when all the treasures are found, your victory will be complete. Get ready to embark on an addictive mining adventure like no other!


Embark on an extraordinary journey and unlock a multitude of achievements along the way.

Features:


  • Discover different biomes around the world

  • Experience an exciting story and learn more about the backgrounds

  • Find the hidden symbols and unlock achievements

name: AURUM

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB, AMD Radeon 7850 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 7 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 1050, AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 compatible Sound Card

short_description: The world of AURUM has been shaken. Thieves from hell stole the treasures of the three wolf gods. Now the world is facing a huge chaos and you as a traveler must help the gods to find and collect all the treasures.
supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Simplified Chinese, Russian
*languages with full audio support
